channel.title: 1900X1200 res?
channel.description:
Not sure if I'm doing something wrong, or if the game just wont support it, but does anyone know if it's even possible to get 1900X1200?
Thanks

item.title: 1900X1200 res?
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
It’s so annoying when people do these kinda threads, people reply accordingly and then we get no response back.

So rude.

Read full topic

item.title: 1900X1200 res?
item.dc:creator: Kairouseki
item.description:
There are some games like Assassin’s Creed and Mirror’s Edge that don’t support 16:10 resolutions so you get letterboxing. Most games do though, it might be a little hidden where you have to pick your aspect ration from a dropdown box.

Read full topic

item.title: 1900X1200 res?
item.dc:creator: Pyroclase
item.description:
Depending on the game, I think you can also force a certain resolution by messing with config files or launch option.

Read full topic

item.title: 1900X1200 res?
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
Just to clarify, don’t you mean 1920x1200?

If so, that’s a 16:10 resolution. Below the resolution menu there’s another dropdown menu where you should be able to change the aspect ratio to 16:10 and set it to that resolution.

Read full topic
